languages.text: Очищенный монолит сияет путеводной звездой, и волны спокойствия и облегчения окутывают сердца тех, кто оказался поблизости.
The purified Monolith shines like a guiding star, and waves of calm and relief wash over the hearts of those who step close.
languages.original_text: Очищенный монолит сияет путеводной звездой, и волны спокойствия и облегчения окутывают сердца тех, кто оказался поблизости.

traits.locale_text: The purified Monolith shines like a guiding star, and waves of calm and relief wash over the hearts of those who step close.
The purified Monolith shines like a guiding star, and waves of calm and relief wash over the hearts of those who step close.
The purified Monolith shines like a guiding star, and waves of calm and relief wash over the hearts of those who step close.
The purified Monolith shines like a guiding star, and waves of calm and relief wash over the hearts of those who step close.
The purified Monolith shines like a guiding star, and waves of calm and relief wash over the hearts of those who step close.

languages.text: Le monolithe purifié brille comme un astre tutélaire, et il diffuse des ondes apaisantes qui réchauffent le cœur de tous ceux qui s'en approchent.
languages.original_text: The purified Monolith shines like a guiding star, and waves of calm and relief wash over the hearts of those who step close.

traits.locale_text: Le monolithe purifié brille comme un astre tutélaire, et il diffuse des ondes apaisantes qui réchauffent le cœur de tous ceux qui s'en approchent.

languages.text: 浄化されたモノリスは導きの星のように輝き、一歩近づいた人の心には穏やかさと安堵の波が押し寄せる。
languages.original_text: The purified Monolith shines like a guiding star, and waves of calm and relief wash over the hearts of those who step close.

traits.locale_text: 浄化されたモノリスは導きの星のように輝き、一歩近づいた人の心には穏やかさと安堵の波が押し寄せる。

languages.text: 巨型灵魂石已经得到了净化，此刻像指路的明星一样闪耀。所有接近它的人，都会感到心中充满了宁静与祥和。
languages.original_text: The purified Monolith shines like a guiding star, and waves of calm and relief wash over the hearts of those who step close.

traits.locale_text: 巨型灵魂石已经得到了净化，此刻像指路的明星一样闪耀。所有接近它的人，都会感到心中充满了宁静与祥和。

languages.text: Der geläuterte Monolith strahlt wie ein Leitstern. Wellen von Ruhe und Erleichterung spülen sanft über die Herzen aller, die sich ihm nähern.
languages.original_text: The purified Monolith shines like a guiding star, and waves of calm and relief wash over the hearts of those who step close.

traits.locale_text: Der geläuterte Monolith strahlt wie ein Leitstern. Wellen von Ruhe und Erleichterung spülen sanft über die Herzen aller, die sich ihm nähern.

languages.text: El Monolito purificado brilla como una luminaria, enviando oleadas de calma y serenidad que alivian los corazones de quienes se acercan a él.
languages.original_text: The purified Monolith shines like a guiding star, and waves of calm and relief wash over the hearts of those who step close.

traits.locale_text: El Monolito purificado brilla como una luminaria, enviando oleadas de calma y serenidad que alivian los corazones de quienes se acercan a él.

languages.text: Arınmış Monolit, yol gösteren bir yıldız misali parlayarak yaklaşan herkesin kalbine sükûnet ve iç rahatlığı aşılıyor.
languages.original_text: The purified Monolith shines like a guiding star, and waves of calm and relief wash over the hearts of those who step close.

traits.locale_text: Arınmış Monolit, yol gösteren bir yıldız misali parlayarak yaklaşan herkesin kalbine sükûnet ve iç rahatlığı getiriyor.
